name: Alien Trampoline Escape
description:
A simple flash-inspired game where you fly through a weird alien landscape while you try to hit as many trampolines as possible, to get farther. Made in a day for the ScoreSpace Jam #21 with the them Bounce. The game has highscores and an online leaderboard. All the art is AI generated with Stable Diffusion.

Space, left click or tap the screen to control. (one button game)

First control pitch and force of the throw.

While you are flying you can force yourself downwards

Made by

- Jonathan B. Jørgensen @JonathanTheDev

- Oliver Vejen @doomedcloud

All the art is AI generated with Stable Diffusion under the  CreativeML Open RAIL-M license.

Sounds are home-made with some mixing of licensed sounds.

Music:

- Farting Around Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

- Space Ambience - Written by Alexander Nakarada under CC0

Font is Bebas Neue under the Open Font License.
